gobblin.kafka.client

Class AbstractBaseKafkaConsumerClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.kafka.client.AbstractBaseKafkaConsumerClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GobblinKafkaConsumerClient, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public abstract class AbstractBaseKafkaConsumerClient
extends Object
implements GobblinKafkaConsumerClient
    A base GobblinKafkaConsumerClient that sets configurations shared by all GobblinKafkaConsumerClients
